articles.title: Draymond Green suspended 1 game after getting 16th technical foul - ESPN
articles.description: The NBA said it will not rescind Draymond Green's 16th technical foul of the season, meaning Green will be suspended for one game without pay.
articles.content:
The NBA will not rescind Draymond Green's 16th technical foul of the season, the league announced Thursday, meaning Green will be suspended for one game without pay.
